sentences.en: All kids have tremendous talent, and we squander them.
sentences.cn: 所有的孩子都有非凡的天赋, 只是我们把它们浪费了.

sentences.en: Although sometimes very gluttonous, but I ain't a person who squander money like dust.
sentences.cn: 虽然有时很贪嘴, 但是我却不是个挥金如土的人.

sentences.en: Brothers, let us squander our morning in futile songs.
sentences.cn: 弟兄们, 让我们把清晨浪费在无用的歌曲上面吧.

sentences.en: But I believe that Spain is likely to squander that advantage.
sentences.cn: 但我认为,西班牙可能会浪费这一优势.

sentences.en: Don't blow that chance. Don't squander your best asset, which is yourself . Whenever you write anything.
sentences.cn: 不要放过这次机会, 不要浪费你最大的财富, 这就是你自己.

sentences.en: Don't squander the gold of your days.
sentences.cn: 别虚掷你的寸金光阴吧.

sentences.en: Don't squander your affection on him he'll never love you.
sentences.cn: 别把感情耗在他身上了--他永远不会爱你的.

sentences.en: Don't squander your affection on him.
sentences.cn: 不要把感情浪费在他身上.

sentences.en: Don't squander your disposable income on a disposable car.
sentences.cn: 仅此一次,给我们的车它们应有的外表.

sentences.en: He said she used to squander the money.
I'll squander all strengths to love you.
sentences.cn: 峩会花光所有力气去爱你.

sentences.en: Isn't it foolish to squander all the money on wedding ceremony?
sentences.cn: 不管你有多少钱,如果乱花到头来也是空空如也.把全部钱花在婚礼上,不是傻了 吗 ?

sentences.en: Negatively, you could periodically gamble or squander your resources in hopeless dreams.
sentences.cn: 从消极的方面来讲, 你可能会周期性地将你的精力和资源浪费在不可能实现的梦想上.

sentences.en: The home team squandered a number of chances in the first half.
sentences.cn: 主队在上半场浪费了几次机会。

sentences.en: You are in fact squander away your love ability if you pay out your love blindly.
sentences.cn: 轻率的爱实际上是在挥霍自己爱的能力.

sentences.en: You think I would squander her money?
sentences.cn: 他以为我会挥霍掉她的钱财?

trans.tran_cn: 挥霍，浪费，驱散，使散开，浪荡，漂泊
trans.tran_en: to carelessly waste money, time, opportunities etc
to carelessly waste money, time, opportunities etc
